verses.text: Now in the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, that \add is\add*, the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w*, on the \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the same, when the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandment|strong="H1697"\w* and his \w decree|strong="H1881"\w* drew \w near|strong="H5060"\w* to be put in \w execution|strong="H6213"\w*, in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that the \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w hoped|strong="H7663"\w* to have \w power|strong="H7980"\w* over them, (though it was \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* to the contrary, that the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* had \w rule|strong="H7980"\w* over them that \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* them;)

The \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6950"\w* in their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* throughout all the \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*, to \w lay|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* on such as \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* their \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*: and no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* could \w withstand|strong="H5975"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*; for the \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of them \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And all the \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*, and the \w lieutenants|strong="H0323"\w*, and the \w deputies|strong="H6346"\w*, and \w officers|strong="H6213"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w helped|strong="H5375"\w* the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*; because the \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon them.\f + \fr 9.3 \ft officers…: Heb. those which did the business that belonged to the king\f*

For \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \add was\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* in the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and his \w fame|strong="H8089"\w* went \w out|strong="H1980"\w* throughout all the \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*: for this \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w waxed|strong="H1980"\w* greater and \w greater|strong="H1419"\w*.

Thus the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* all their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* with the \w stroke|strong="H4347"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w slaughter|strong="H2027"\w*, and \w destruction|strong="H0012"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* what they \w would|strong="H7522"\w* unto those that \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* them.\f + \fr 9.5 \ft what…: Heb. according to their will\f*

And in \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w* the \w palace|strong="H1002"\w* the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* and \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.
And \w Parshandatha|strong="H6577"\w*, and \w Dalphon|strong="H1813"\w*, and \w Aspatha|strong="H0630"\w*,
And \w Poratha|strong="H6334"\w*, and \w Adalia|strong="H0118"\w*, and \w Aridatha|strong="H0743"\w*,
And \w Parmashta|strong="H6534"\w*, and \w Arisai|strong="H0747"\w*, and \w Aridai|strong="H0742"\w*, and \w Vajezatha|strong="H2055"\w*,

The \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hammedatha|strong="H4099"\w*, the \w enemy|strong="H6887"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* they; but on the \w spoil|strong="H0961"\w* \w laid|strong="H7971"\w* they not their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

On that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of those that were \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* in \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w* the \w palace|strong="H1002"\w* was \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 9.11 \ft was…: Heb. came\f*

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*, The \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* have \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* and \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* in \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w* the \w palace|strong="H1002"\w*, and the \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*; what have they \w done|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*? now what \add is\add* thy \w petition|strong="H7596"\w*? and it shall be \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* thee: or what \add is\add* thy \w request|strong="H1246"\w* \w further|strong="H5750"\w*? and it shall be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w*, If it \w please|strong="H2896"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, let it be \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* which \add are\add* in \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* also according unto this \w day’s|strong="H3117"\w* \w decree|strong="H1881"\w*, and let \w Haman’s|strong="H2001"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* be \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* upon the \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w*.\f + \fr 9.13 \ft let Haman’s…: Heb. let men hang, etc\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* it so to be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*: and the \w decree|strong="H1881"\w* was \w given|strong="H5414"\w* at \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w*; and they \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w Haman’s|strong="H2001"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

For the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* that \add were\add* in \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6950"\w* on the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* also of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* at \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w*; but on the \w prey|strong="H0961"\w* they \w laid|strong="H7971"\w* not their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

But the \w other|strong="H7605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6950"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* for their \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*, and had \w rest|strong="H5118"\w* from their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* of their \w foes|strong="H8130"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, but they \w laid|strong="H7971"\w* not their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* on the \w prey|strong="H0961"\w*,

On the \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w*; and on the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* day of the same \w rested|strong="H5118"\w* they, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* it a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w feasting|strong="H4960"\w* and \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*.\f + \fr 9.17 \ft of the same: Heb. in it\f*

But the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* that \add were\add* at \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w* assembled \w together|strong="H6950"\w* on the \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* \add day\add* thereof, and on the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* thereof; and on the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \add day\add* of the same they \w rested|strong="H5118"\w*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* it a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w feasting|strong="H4960"\w* and \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*.

Therefore the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* of the \w villages|strong="H6521"\w*, that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w unwalled|strong="H6519"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w*, \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w* \add a day of\add* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* and \w feasting|strong="H4960"\w*, and a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and of \w sending|strong="H4916"\w* \w portions|strong="H4490"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H7453"\w*.

¶ And \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* these \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* unto all the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* that \add were\add* in all the \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*, \add both\add* \w nigh|strong="H7138"\w* and \w far|strong="H7350"\w*,

To \w stablish|strong="H6965"\w* \add this\add* among them, that they should \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w*, and the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the same, \w yearly|strong="H8141"\w*,

As the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* wherein the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w rested|strong="H5117"\w* from their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* which was \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* unto them from \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w* to \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*, and from \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* into a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: that they should \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w feasting|strong="H4960"\w* and \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*, and of \w sending|strong="H4916"\w* \w portions|strong="H4490"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, and \w gifts|strong="H4979"\w* to the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w*.

And the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w undertook|strong="H6901"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* as they had \w begun|strong="H2490"\w*, and as \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* had \w written|strong="H3789"\w* unto them;

Because \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hammedatha|strong="H4099"\w*, the \w Agagite|strong="H0091"\w*, the \w enemy|strong="H6887"\w* of all the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, had \w devised|strong="H2803"\w* against the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* them, and had \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w Pur|strong="H6332"\w*, that \add is\add*, the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*, to \w consume|strong="H2000"\w* them, and to \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* them;\f + \fr 9.24 \ft consume: Heb. crush\f*

But when \add Esther\add* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, he \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* by \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* that his \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w device|strong="H4284"\w*, which he \w devised|strong="H2803"\w* against the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, should \w return|strong="H7725"\w* upon his own \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and that he and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* should be \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* on the \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w*.\f + \fr 9.25 \ft when…: Heb. when she came\f*

Wherefore they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* these \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w Purim|strong="H6332"\w* after the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Pur|strong="H6332"\w*. Therefore for all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w letter|strong="H0107"\w*, and \add of that\add* which they had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* concerning this \w matter|strong="H3602"\w*, and which had \w come|strong="H5060"\w* unto them,\f + \fr 9.26 \ft Pur: that is, Lot\f*

The \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w ordained|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w took|strong="H6901"\w* upon them, and upon their \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, and upon all such as \w joined|strong="H3867"\w* themselves unto them, so as it should not \w fail|strong="H5674"\w*, that they would \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* these \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* according to their \w writing|strong="H3791"\w*, and according to their \add appointed\add* \w time|strong="H2165"\w* every \w year|strong="H8141"\w*;\f + \fr 9.27 \ft fail: Heb. pass\f*

And \add that\add* these \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add should be\add* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* and \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \w throughout|strong="H1755"\w* every \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*, every \w family|strong="H4940"\w*, every \w province|strong="H4082"\w*, and every \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; and \add that\add* these \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Purim|strong="H6332"\w* should not \w fail|strong="H5674"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, nor the \w memorial|strong="H2143"\w* of them \w perish|strong="H5486"\w* from their \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*.\f + \fr 9.28 \ft fail: Heb. pass\f*\f + \fr 9.28 \ft perish: Heb. be ended\f*

Then \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Abihail|strong="H0032"\w*, and \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* the \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w*, \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* with all \w authority|strong="H8633"\w*, to \w confirm|strong="H6965"\w* this \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w letter|strong="H0107"\w* of \w Purim|strong="H6332"\w*.\f + \fr 9.29 \ft authority: Heb. strength\f*

And he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* the \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* unto all the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, to the \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*, \add with\add* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*,

To \w confirm|strong="H6965"\w* these \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Purim|strong="H6332"\w* in their \w times|strong="H2165"\w* \add appointed\add*, according as \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* the \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w* and \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* had \w enjoined|strong="H6965"\w* them, and as they had \w decreed|strong="H6965"\w* for \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w* and for their \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, the \w matters|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w fastings|strong="H6685"\w* and their \w cry|strong="H2201"\w*.\f + \fr 9.31 \ft themselves: Heb. their souls\f*

And the \w decree|strong="H3982"\w* of \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* \w confirmed|strong="H6965"\w* these \w matters|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Purim|strong="H6332"\w*; and it was \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w*.
